original_text: First, I taught God's message to the Jews in Damascus. Then I also taught God's message to the Jews in Jerusalem and in all of Judea region. Later I also spoke to the Gentiles. I said to all of them, “You must stop doing wrong things. You must turn to God. You must do good things. That will show that you have really changed how you live.”
korean_text: 먼저 다메섹과 예루살렘에 있는 사람과 유대 온 땅과 이방인에게까지 회개하고 하나님께로 돌아와서 회개에 합당한 일을 하라 전하므로

sentences.original_text: First, I taught God's message to the Jews in Damascus.
sentences.korean_translation: 먼저 나는 다마스쿠스에 있는 유대인들에게 하나님의 메시지를 가르쳤습니다.

sentences.original_text: Then I also taught God's message to the Jews in Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 그후에 나는 예루살렘에 있는 유대인들에게도 하나님의 메시지를 가르쳤습니다.

sentences.original_text: and in all of Judea region.
Later I also spoke to the Gentiles.
I said to all of them,
You must stop doing wrong things.
That will show that you have really changed how you live.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 당신이 정말로 삶을 바꾸었음을 보여줄 것입니다.
